dotnetType.name: DateTimeResolverCase
dotnetType.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> and <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />.

returns.summary:
A successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.TimestampResolution" /> result if the type is <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />
            or <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />; an unsuccessful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" />
            result otherwise.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DateTimeResolverCase extends Chr.Avro.Resolution.ReflectionResolverCase
